topic.title: Edit Yeastar Click to Call
topic.shortdesc: After installing Yeastar Click to Call, you may need to configure Chrome-specific settings, which is associated with the Extension, such as permissions and icon display.

section.title: Edit Yeastar Click to Call permissions
section.p: You can change the permission of reading and changing site data for Yeastar Click to Call at any time.

ol.li: On you computer, open Google Chrome Browser.
On the right of the address bar (URL field), click .

Hover your mouse over This can read and change site data, and decide which permission should be granted to Yeastar Click to Call.
When you click the extension: Only when you click will Yeastar Click to Call work. This only allows Yeastar Click to Call to access the current site in the open tab or window. If you close the tab or window, you should click to turn the Extension on again.
On current site: Allow Yeastar Click to Call to automatically read and change data on the current site.
On all sites: Allow Yeastar Click to Call to automatically read and change data on all sites.

section.title: Hide/Unhide Yeastar Click to Call
section.p: You can decide whether to display Yeastar icon right beside the address bar (URL field).

Open Google Chrome Browser, and go to the right of the address bar (URL field):
To hide Yeastar icon, go to
Hide in Chrome menu .
To unhide Yeastar icon, go to
Show in toolbar .
